Basic personal profile information
classifications.description: Refers to basic personal information data, such as personal name, gender, nationality, personal identity data related to the Foreign Account Taxpayer Act (FATCA), ethnicity, marital status, certificate type, certificate number, certificate effective date, certificate expiration date, home address

classifications.title: personal property information
classifications.description: Refers to personal property data, such as personal income status, status of real estate owned, status of vehicles owned, tax amount, provident fund payment amount, personal social security and medical insurance payment amount, etc.

classifications.title: Personal contact information
classifications.description: Refers to various personal communication contact data, such as mobile phone, landline phone, email address, WeChat ID, etc.

classifications.title: Personal health and physiological information
classifications.description: Refers to relevant record data generated during the treatment of a person's illness, such as symptoms, hospitalization records, medical orders, test reports, surgery and anesthesia records, nursing records, medication records, drug and food allergy information, fertility information, past medical history, diagnosis and treatment status,

classifications.title: Personal location information
classifications.description: It refers to the geographical location data that can specifically locate an individual, such as the usual location and current location in the country, city, region, street, longitude and latitude, etc.

classifications.title: Personal education information
classifications.description: Refers to the record data of an individualâ€™s education, such as the date of admission, date of graduation, name of the school attended, department of the school attended, academic qualifications, degree and subject information, etc.

classifications.title: Personal and professional information
classifications.description: Refers to personal employment history data, such as work unit, work start date, work end date, position, work location, income (including income value), etc.

classifications.title: Personal qualification certificate information
classifications.description: Refers to the record data of an individual's qualification certificate, such as the number of the qualification certificate, issuing authority, effective date, expiration date, etc.

classifications.title: Personal political party information
classifications.description: Refers to data related to personal political outlook, such as party affiliation, time of joining the party, etc.

classifications.title: traditional authentication information
classifications.description: Refers to the data relied on by various conventional personal identification technical means, such as bank card track (or chip equivalent information), card verification code (CVN and CVN2), card validity period, bank card password, payment password, account (including but not

classifications.title: Weakly private biometric information
classifications.description: Refers to weakly private personal biometric sample data and characteristic value data used for identity authentication, such as face, voiceprint, gait, earprint, eyeprint, handwriting, etc.

classifications.title: Strong privacy biometric information
classifications.description: Refers to strong privacy personal biometric sample data and feature value data used for identity authentication, such as fingerprints, iris, etc.

classifications.title: Identification auxiliary information
classifications.description: Refers to data that assists in identity authentication, such as dynamic passwords, SMS verification codes, answers to password prompt questions, dynamic voiceprint passwords, etc.

classifications.title: personal credit information
classifications.description: Refers to personal credit history record data, such as personal loan information, personal repayment information, personal arrears information and other data generated by individuals in the credit process.

classifications.title: Personal judicial information
classifications.description: Refers to judicial information record data related to individuals, such as information on dishonest persons subject to execution, information on persons subject to execution, court opening information, case filing announcement information, criminal records, records of violations of laws and regulations, etc.

classifications.title: personal relationship information
classifications.description: Refers to record data used to describe the relationship between an individual and his or her related parties, such as children, parents, siblings, spouse, social relationships, etc.

classifications.title: intercompany relationship information
classifications.description: Refers to record data used to describe the relationship between an individual and related parties of the unit, such as legal representative, financial person in charge, business managers, general employees, senior executives, etc.

classifications.title: behavioral information
classifications.description: Refers to behavioral data when a business relationship occurs, such as describing customers' consultation, purchase or use of products of financial institutions through online banking, mobile banking, APP, counters, account managers, remote banking, emails, text messages, social networks, auxiliary channels, etc.

classifications.title: Basic label information
classifications.description: Refers to label data used to describe an individual based on basic personal attribute information, such as personal labels constructed based on education, occupation, etc.

classifications.title: Relationship tag information
classifications.description: Refers to tag data constructed based on personal association attribute information to describe personal relationships, such as personal tags constructed based on family relationships, professional relationships, business relationships, etc.

classifications.title: Signing label information
classifications.description: It refers to the label data constructed based on the product information of financial institutions held by individuals to describe the individual's contract status, such as personal deposit labels, personal loan labels, etc.

classifications.title: Transaction tag information
classifications.description: Refers to tag data constructed based on personal transaction information to describe personal transaction situations, such as payment and settlement business tags, etc.

classifications.title: Behavior tag information
classifications.description: Refers to label data constructed based on personal behavior information to describe personal behavior, such as internal behavior labels, external behavior labels, etc.

classifications.title: Marketing services label information
classifications.description: Refers to label data constructed based on personal marketing service attribute information (extracted and processed from personal marketing service attributes and constructed separately to describe individual marketing services), such as marketing management labels (activity rights, whitelists, etc.), service

classifications.title: Risk label information
classifications.description: Refers to label data constructed based on personal risk information (extracted and processed from personal risk information and constructed separately to describe personal risks), such as high-risk customer labels, etc.

classifications.title: Value tag information
classifications.description: It refers to label data formed based on the analysis of personal value (extracted and processed from information including financial product preferences, personal property status, etc., and constructed separately to describe personal value), such as comprehensive evaluation labels, product holding level labels, etc.

classifications.title: Basic overview of the unit
classifications.description: Refers to the basic profile data of the unit, such as the name of the legal representative, company name, unified social credit code, business license, business scope, industry classification, economic type, staff size, registered capital, company address, etc.

classifications.title: Shareholder information
classifications.description: Refers to the information data of the main investors, such as the name of the controlling shareholder, registered capital, paid-in capital, etc.

classifications.title: Management information
classifications.description: Refers to the information data of the main members of the company's management and actual controllers, such as their names, certificate types, certificate numbers, contact information, etc.

classifications.title: Unit contact information
classifications.description: Refers to the unitâ€™s contact information data, such as contact number, contact person, mailing address, etc.

classifications.title: Unit financial information
classifications.description: Refers to unit financial information data, such as operating income, total profits, asset status, liability status, etc.

classifications.title: traditional authentication information
classifications.description: Refers to data used to verify that an organization has access or usage rights.

classifications.title: Corporate credit information
classifications.description: Refers to enterprise credit history record information, such as enterprise borrowing information, enterprise repayment information, enterprise arrears information and other data generated by enterprises in the credit process.

classifications.title: Corporate judicial information
classifications.description: Refers to corporate judicial-related data, such as information on dishonest persons subject to execution, information on persons subject to execution, court opening announcement information, case filing announcement information, etc.

classifications.title: Corporate tax information
classifications.description: Refers to corporate tax data, such as tax payment status, corporate taxpayer credit rating information, corporate value-added tax payment reduction of more than 20% year-on-year, etc.

classifications.title: Enterprise business information
classifications.description: It refers to the queryable data entered by the enterprise in the market supervision department, such as enterprise license information, registration date, enterprise type, shareholder and investor information, key management personnel information, enterprise external investment, etc.

classifications.title: Inter-unit relationship information
classifications.description: Refers to data describing the relationship between a unit and its related parties, such as group relationships, family businesses, mutual shareholdings, etc.

classifications.title: public-private relationship information
classifications.description: Refers to data describing the relationship between the unit and individual related parties, such as legal representatives, financial directors, business managers, general employees, senior executives, etc.

classifications.title: behavioral information
classifications.description: Refers to behavioral data when business relationships occur, such as when consulting, purchasing or using products or services of financial institutions through online banking, mobile banking, APP, counters, account managers, remote banking, email, text messages, social networks, auxiliary channels, etc.

classifications.title: Basic label information
classifications.description: Refers to label data constructed based on the unit's own attributes, such as financial customer labels, etc.

classifications.title: Relationship tag information
classifications.description: Refers to tag data constructed based on unit relationships, such as supply chain core customer tags, etc.

classifications.title: Signing label information
classifications.description: Refers to tag data constructed based on the unit's products and investment preferences, such as online banking contract tags, etc.

classifications.title: Transaction tag information
classifications.description: Refers to tag data constructed based on unit transaction information, such as settlement customer tags, etc.

classifications.title: Behavior tag information
classifications.description: Refers to tag data constructed based on the behavior and habits of the unit, such as customer preference tags for online banking, etc.

classifications.title: Marketing label information
classifications.description: Refers to the classification label data constructed for units based on marketing strategies and services, such as strategic customer labels, etc.

classifications.title: Risk label information
classifications.description: Refers to label data constructed based on unit risk information, such as high-risk customer labels, etc.

classifications.title: Value tag information
classifications.description: Refers to evaluation label data constructed based on unit value, such as customer ratings, contribution, etc.

classifications.title: Basic Information
classifications.description: Refers to the basic information data of the account, such as account number, account type, margin account mark, account status, account opening institution number, account opening date, account closing date, payment mark (as a substitute value for original transaction elements such as payment account number, used to complete specific

classifications.title: Amount information
classifications.description: Refers to the amount information data on the account, such as amount, balance, currency, etc.

classifications.title: media information
classifications.description: Refers to the media-related information data attached to the account, such as media number, card type, etc.

classifications.title: Freeze information
classifications.description: Refers to the relevant information data recorded when the account is frozen, such as freezing type, freezing date, frozen amount, status and other related attribute information.

classifications.title: Unique account information
classifications.description: Refers to account information opened by government agencies or commercial banks at the People's Bank of China.

classifications.title: Basic Information
classifications.description: Refers to the basic information data of the legal digital currency wallet, such as wallet ID, wallet type, wallet level, wallet name, wallet operating agency number, wallet opening date, wallet status, etc.

classifications.title: Basic Information
classifications.description: Refers to the basic attribute data common to various specific businesses as stipulated in the Contract Law and the Commercial Banking Law, such as contract number, contract name, contract type, contract status, effective date, expiration date, termination date, term, amount, currency

classifications.title: Contract quality inspection information
classifications.description: This article is added manually with reference to Ji Zhiâ€™s preliminary sorting situation.

classifications.title: Basic policy information
classifications.description: Refers to the basic information of the policy in the insurance business, such as application number, policy number, insurer, policyholder, insured, beneficiary, signing date, effective date, insurance premium and payment method, special agreement, health notice,

classifications.title: Policy loan information
classifications.description: Refers to data related to the customer's borrowing from the insurer with cash value guarantee, such as loan time, amount, interest rate, repayment plan, etc.

classifications.title: Claims case information
classifications.description: Refers to the data related to the claim settlement of the case, such as the person who reported the case, the person who suffered the accident, the date of the report, the time of the accident, the location of the accident, the description of the accident, the outcome of the accident, the amount of the claim, the claim materials, etc.

classifications.title: Claims investigation information
classifications.description: Refers to data related to claims investigation, such as document verification, on-site investigation, online investigation, third-party cooperation investigation, other investigation reports, investigation conclusions (such as property losses, casualties, causes of accidents, accident liability, accident third parties, etc.)

classifications.title: Compensation result information
classifications.description: Refers to documents related to compensation results, such as claim settlement conclusion, claim settlement time limit, compensation amount, recovery costs, recovery compensation, reasons for rejection of compensation, blacklist, litigation information, etc.

classifications.title: Policy liability information
classifications.description: Refers to the data on the scope of insurance protection provided by the insurer to the insured as agreed in the insurance contract.

classifications.title: Property insurance subject information
classifications.description: It refers to the tangible physical insurance subject matter with economic value, which is the bearer of insurance interests for which the policy holder requests the insurer to bear the risk and provide economic protection.

classifications.title: Liability insurance subject information
classifications.description: Refers to the subject data of liability insurance that belongs to the insured's legal financial liability to a third party, such as employer liability, product liability, public liability, etc. The specific information includes the insured company's information, operating methods, operating environment,

classifications.title: Credit guarantee insurance subject information
classifications.description: Refers to data in which the obligated party's failure to fulfill its obligations will cause the right party to suffer economic losses, such as project performance information, supply guarantee information, product quality guarantee information, loan guarantee information, employee loyalty guarantee information, export credit information, etc.

classifications.title: Special risk subject information
classifications.description: Refers to data mainly related to aviation, aerospace, nuclear power plants and petroleum development, such as address information, equipment information, driver information, etc. of related projects or projects.

classifications.title: Underwriting information
classifications.description: Refers to data related to the insurance underwriting process and results, such as risk survey information, underwriting conclusions, underwriting opinions, fee increases, discounts, reductions, etc.

classifications.title: Preserve correction information
classifications.description: Refers to data related to preservation (changes) carried out by Keshi to maintain the validity of the insurance contract, such as preservation modification items, reasons for changes, content of changes, impact of changes, effective time, etc.

classifications.title: Sales channel fee information
classifications.description: Refers to the fee data that needs to be paid to intermediaries and agents during the insurance sales process, such as agent commissions, agency fees, broker/agency brokerage fees, etc.

classifications.title: Reinsurance contract information
classifications.description: Refers to the relevant data of the reinsurance contract, such as information on the ceding and ceding institutions, contract period, reinsurance reinsurance method (contract, temporary placement, etc.), reinsurance method (proportional, non-proportional, etc. information), reinsurance business type (life insurance,

classifications.title: Reinsurance business details
classifications.description: Refers to the detailed data on reinsurance business submitted by the ceding institution to the ceding institution on time, such as policy number, name of the insured, insurance subject information, insurance period, insurance conditions, insurance amount, insurance rate, insurance premium, etc., as well as reinsurance

classifications.title: Reinsurance claim information
classifications.description: Refers to the relevant data of reinsurance claims, such as reinsurance contract name and business year, insured subject risk information, insurance amount and ceding ratio, estimated compensation and estimated compensation amount information under the contract, information on the date and place of compensation occurrence, actual compensation distribution

classifications.title: Reinsurance billing information
classifications.description: Refers to the billing data of reinsurance business, such as cedent information, payer information, settlement item information, contract/provisional information, benefit amount information, etc.

classifications.title: Trust product information
classifications.description: Refers to the element information related to the trust products established by the trust company, such as basic information of trust products (trust product code, trust product brand, product establishment date, expected maturity date), trust product account and balance information (account category, account balance),

classifications.title: Trust fundraising information
classifications.description: Refers to information on relevant elements of trust company project fund raising, such as trust contract information (trust contract number, trustor number, amount of entrusted funds), trust beneficiary certificate information (beneficiary number, actual trust amount held, actual trust share held)

classifications.title: Trust utilization information
classifications.description: Refers to the element information related to the use of the trust company's trust property (including funds and property rights), such as property use information (use contract number, counterparty number, contract signing amount), trust guarantee contract information (guarantee contract number, total guarantee amount), trust

classifications.title: inherent business information
classifications.description: Refers to the relevant element information of the trust company's inherent business management, such as inherent fund utilization contract information (utilization fund number, investment industry and details, contract signing amount, early termination indicator), inherent guarantee contract information (guarantee contract number, guarantee contract type,

classifications.title: Financial asset management company business information
Debt transfer contract information
classifications.description: Refers to the information on acquisition, disposal and other agreements signed by financial asset management companies during the operation and management of non-performing assets and the contract information on the transfer of subject matter.

classifications.title: Asset information
classifications.description: Refers to information on non-performing assets operated by financial asset management companies.

classifications.title: Basic Information
classifications.description: Refers to the basic attribute data of deposit business, such as deposit business type, term type, etc.

classifications.title: Interest calculation information
classifications.description: Refers to the interest accrual related information data of the account, such as interest start date, expiration date, interest settlement method, interest accrual basis, interest accrual period, etc.

classifications.title: Basic Information
classifications.description: Refers to the basic attribute information data of the loan business, such as loan type, loan purpose, loan investment direction, loan amount, loan balance, margin, etc.
