classifications.title: Credit information
classifications.description: Refers to the relevant data information related to credit in loan business, such as credit type, credit purpose, credit currency, credit period, start date, end date, etc.

classifications.title: Warranty information
classifications.description: Refers to data and information related to guarantees involved in loan business, such as guarantor, guarantee method, guarantee type, guarantee amount, guarantee ratio, etc.

classifications.title: Post repayment information
classifications.description: Refers to data information related to loan repayment, such as loan date, loan amount, repayment method, repayment amount, repayment date, etc.

classifications.title: Overdue information
classifications.description: Refers to data information related to overdue loan business, such as overdue date, overdue amount, overdue days, penalty interest rate, penalty interest amount, interest arrears amount, etc.

classifications.title: Exhibition information
classifications.description: Refers to the relevant data and information of loan business involving extension, such as extension period, extension interest rate, extension amount, number of extensions, reasons for extension, etc.

classifications.title: Advance information
classifications.description: Refers to relevant data and information related to advances in loan business, such as advance type, advance amount, advance date, advance interest rate, etc.

classifications.title: Default information
classifications.description: Refers to relevant data and information on loan business involving default, such as type of default, date of default, payment ratio of liquidated damages, etc.

classifications.title: Collection information
classifications.description: Refers to data information related to loan collection related to loan business, such as collection methods, collection cycles, etc.

classifications.title: Basic Information
classifications.description: Refers to the basic attribute data information of intermediary business, such as intermediary business type, handling fee, rate, etc.

classifications.title: Consulting intermediate business information
classifications.description: Refers to financial institutions relying on their own advantages in information, talent, reputation, etc. to collect and organize relevant data, and by recording and analyzing these data and bank and customer fund movements, they form systematic information and plans and provide them to customers.

classifications.title: Transactional intermediate business information
classifications.description: Refers to data information on financial transactions carried out by financial institutions using various financial instruments to meet the needs of customers for value preservation or own risk management, such as forward foreign exchange contracts, financial futures, commodity futures, swaps and options.

classifications.title: Fund custody intermediary business information
classifications.description: Refers to commercial banks with custody qualifications accepting the entrustment of fund management companies to safely keep all the assets of the funds under custody, handling fund liquidation transfers, accounting, fund valuation, and supervising the investment operations of the managers for the funds under custody.

classifications.title: Payment and settlement intermediate business information
classifications.description: It refers to the charging business data information related to currency payments and fund transfers caused by creditor-debt relationships handled by financial institutions for customers, and the payment and settlement business information of intermediary businesses, such as bill business, collection business, letter of credit business, settlement business, etc.

classifications.title: Intermediate business information on guarantees and commitments
classifications.description: Refers to the data and information of commercial banks providing guarantees for customers' debt repayment ability and assuming customer default risks, such as acceptance bills, standby letters of credit, various types of guarantee business, and the keepwell agreements provided by financial asset management companies to their member units, etc.

classifications.title: Agency intermediate business information
classifications.description: Refers to the data and information of financial institutions accepting entrustment from customers, handling economic affairs specified by customers, and providing paid financial services, as well as agency business information of intermediary businesses, such as agency financial management business, agency collection and payment business, entrusted loan business, etc.

classifications.title: Bank card business information
classifications.description: Refers to the business data information generated when using credit payment instruments issued by authorized financial institutions to the society with all or part of the functions of consumer credit, transfer settlement, cash deposit and withdrawal, etc., including information such as credit card and debit card business.

classifications.title: Other types of intermediate business information
classifications.description: Refers to other intermediate business data information that cannot be classified into the above categories, such as safe deposit boxes and other information.

classifications.title: Basic Information
classifications.description: Refers to the basic information data of fund transactions, such as fund transaction types, three categories of financial assets, fund sources, delivery information and other data.

classifications.title: Interbank fund transaction information
classifications.description: Refers to various financial interbank business data that serve and cooperate with financial interbank customers and center on interbank financing, such as interbank lending, interbank payment and other business data information.

classifications.title: Self-operated capital investment information
classifications.description: Self-operated fund investment refers to data related to businesses in which financial institutions use their own funds to invest, such as proprietary bond transactions, proprietary exchange rate transactions, proprietary interest rate transactions, proprietary derivative transactions and other business data information.

classifications.title: Investment banking information
classifications.description: Refers to data related to investment banking business, which mainly includes business data information such as mergers and acquisitions, fund management, project financing, venture capital, and credit asset securitization.

classifications.title: Hosting business information
classifications.description: Refers to the custody business data of a financial institution with certain qualifications as a custodian who, in accordance with relevant laws and regulations, signs an entrusted asset custody contract with the client to safely keep the entrusted investment assets and perform the relevant responsibilities of the custodian, such as entrusted asset custody, trust assets

classifications.title: Investment and financial management business information
Investment and financial management information
classifications.description: Refers to bank investment and financial management business information, such as investment in money market instruments, bonds, non-standard assets, public funds, financial derivatives and other business information.

classifications.title: Basic Information
classifications.description: Refers to the basic information data of credit card business, such as card opening date, activation date, credit limit and cash withdrawal limit, etc.

classifications.title: Cash withdrawal information
classifications.description: Refers to the cash withdrawal data of credit card business, such as cash withdrawal date, cash withdrawal amount, remaining limit, etc.

classifications.title: consumption information
classifications.description: Refers to the consumption data of credit card business, such as consumption amount, consumption date, remaining balance, etc.

classifications.title: Installment information
classifications.description: Refers to the installment data of credit card business, such as the number of installments, installment fees, etc.

classifications.title: Basic Information
classifications.description: Refers to the basic information data of non-bank payment services, such as providing fund transaction order information generated by fund collection and payment.

classifications.title: Contract information
classifications.description: Refers to business and product-related data signed between financial institutions and merchants, such as merchant name, merchant type, business scenario, contract time, contract service provider, etc.

classifications.title: Classified assessment and rating information
classifications.description: Refers to the information on the classification assessment and rating of financial institutions in anti-money laundering work.

classifications.title: International cooperation information
classifications.description: Refers to information related to foreign affairs activities and international cooperation in anti-money laundering work.

classifications.title: Administrative regulatory information
classifications.description: Refers to information on the performance of supervisory functions in anti-money laundering work, inspection and punishment of financial institutions.

classifications.title: Investigation and assistance information
classifications.description: Refers to information that is used to investigate anti-money laundering cases on its own or assist other institutions in investigating anti-money laundering cases.

classifications.title: Questionnaire information
classifications.description: Refers to information from questionnaires issued to financial institutions during anti-money laundering work.

classifications.title: information communication information
classifications.description: Refers to information on notifications, exchanges, and information sharing in anti-money laundering work and with financial institutions.

classifications.title: Publicity and training information
classifications.description: Refers to anti-money laundering publicity and training information in anti-money laundering business.

classifications.title: Basic information for institutional business application
classifications.description: Refers to the business information related to the organization's application.

classifications.title: Institutional business license certificate management information
classifications.description: Refers to the business information managed by a series of processes such as the printing, receipt, inquiry and destruction of institutional business license certificates.

classifications.title: Achievements review information
classifications.description: Refers to business information related to results review.

classifications.title: Institutional annual inspection information
classifications.description: Refers to business information for annual inspections of financial institutions, including sampling information.

classifications.title: Quota management information
classifications.description: Refers to information related to the issuance and management of refinance (including rediscount) limits.

classifications.title: Refinancing business management information
classifications.description: Refers to the information generated by refinancing business, excluding business information under the payment and settlement category.

classifications.title: Rediscount business management information
classifications.description: Refers to the information generated by rediscount business, excluding business information under the payment and settlement category.

classifications.title: Indicator management information
classifications.description: Refers to business information related to interest rate indicators.

classifications.title: exchange rate information
classifications.description: Refers to business information related to exchange rates.

classifications.title: Real estate monitoring and analysis business information
Real estate data processing information
classifications.description: Refers to the relevant business information for processing the collected data.

classifications.title: Real estate market analysis information
classifications.description: Refers to business information such as analysis and judgment of the real estate market.

classifications.title: Real estate survey information
classifications.description: Refers to business information obtained from real estate-related investigations of institutions.

classifications.title: Public opinion collection information
classifications.description: Refers to the collected news reporting business information.

classifications.title: Hotspot summary information
classifications.description: It means that the business department summarizes and summarizes hot news information and obtains new business information.

classifications.title: Matter application information
classifications.description: Refers to business information related to administrative matters.

classifications.title: Matter approval information
classifications.description: Refers to information such as approval results and notifications.

classifications.title: Currency purchase and sale business information
classifications.description: Refers to the related business of RMB or foreign exchange purchases and sales between domestic and overseas entities.

classifications.title: Missing and late reporting of business information
classifications.description: Refers to business information that is late or omitted in the border business.

classifications.title: Income and expenditure business (including summary) information
classifications.description: Refers to cross-border receipts and payments business information and related summary information.

classifications.title: Cross-border investment and financing business information
classifications.description: Refers to cross-border credit financing, securities transactions, bond issuance and other business information related to investment and financing.

classifications.title: Cross-border guarantee business information
classifications.description: Refers to business information related to cross-border guarantees.

classifications.title: Cross-border banking entity business information
classifications.description: Refers to settlement, clearing and other business information that occurs with banks as the main body.

classifications.title: Cross-border two-way capital pool business information
classifications.description: Refers to the business information that multinational enterprises adjust internal fund balances and deficiencies according to their own operating needs.

classifications.title: Interest rate exchange information
classifications.description: Refers to interest rate and exchange rate information involved in cross-border related business.

classifications.title: Node information
classifications.description: Refers to frequently changing business information within the cross-border payment system.

classifications.title: Withdraw cross-border business information
classifications.description: Refers to canceled business information in cross-border business.

classifications.title: Financial consumer rights protection business information
Consult complaint management information
classifications.description: Refers to business information generated by financial consumersâ€™ inquiries or complaints.

classifications.title: Inclusive financial information
classifications.description: Refers to business information related to work experience in developing inclusive finance.

classifications.title: Inclusive financial indicator management information
classifications.description: Refers to business information entered according to the work requirements of the inclusive financial indicator system.

classifications.title: Case management information
classifications.description: Refers to past case information on financial consumer protection entered into the system.

classifications.title: consumer education information
classifications.description: Refers to the popularization of financial knowledge and promotion of relevant business information.

classifications.title: Electronic bulletin management information
classifications.description: Refers to the release of electronically generated business information related to the protection of financial consumer rights and interests.

classifications.title: Supervision and inspection information
classifications.description: Refers to the business information generated by an institutionâ€™s assessment of financial consumer rights protection, including the institutionâ€™s self-assessment and the Peopleâ€™s Bank of Chinaâ€™s assessment.

classifications.title: Indicator analysis information
classifications.description: Refers to the analysis of business information involving indicators related to financial stability.

classifications.title: Report processing information
classifications.description: Refers to the business information generated by processing financial stability statements.

classifications.title: Treasury revenue and expenditure information
classifications.description: Refers to the treasury revenue and expenditure information of treasury business.

classifications.title: Treasury bond issuance and redemption information
classifications.description: Refers to the treasury bond issuance and redemption information of the treasury business.

classifications.title: Cash management information
classifications.description: Refers to cash management information for treasury operations.

classifications.title: Banknote handling information
classifications.description: Refers to currency sorting, re-counting, destruction and other information in currency gold and silver business.

classifications.title: Issue fund management information
classifications.description: Refers to fund issuance and management information in currency gold and silver business.

classifications.title: Gold import and export management information
classifications.description: Refers to gold import and export management information in monetary gold and silver business.

classifications.title: Currency management information
classifications.description: Refers to currency quality testing, currency entry and exit statistics and other information in currency gold and silver business.

classifications.title: Counterfeit currency management information
classifications.description: Refers to counterfeit currency management information in currency gold and silver business.

classifications.title: Gold and silver physical management information
classifications.description: Refers to information such as physical inventory and allocation of gold and silver in monetary gold and silver business.

classifications.title: Warehouse management information
classifications.description: Refers to monetary gold and silver inventory, allocation and other information in the monetary gold and aluminum business.

classifications.title: Small denomination reservation information
classifications.description: Refers to currency gold and silver business small and medium denomination cash reservation withdrawal business information.

classifications.title: Deposit insurance premium collection information
classifications.description: Refers to the deposit insurance premium collection information in the deposit insurance business.

classifications.title: Rating information of deposit insurance participating institutions
classifications.description: Refers to the information on the ratings of insured financial institutions in the deposit insurance business.

classifications.title: Non-resident identity verification information
classifications.description: Refers to online verification business information for non-resident identity information.

classifications.title: Resident ID card verification information
classifications.description: Refers to information on the online verification business of resident ID cards.

classifications.title: Invalid resident ID card verification information
classifications.description: Refers to information on the online verification business of invalid resident identity cards.

classifications.title: Objection feedback information
classifications.description: Refers to feedback information regarding objections to the verification results in the identity verification business.

classifications.title: Personal credit agency management information
classifications.description: Refers to the management information of personal credit reporting agencies in the credit management business.

classifications.title: Enterprise credit agency management information
classifications.description: Refers to the management information of corporate credit reporting agencies in the credit management business.

classifications.title: Event announcement information
classifications.description: Indicates important event information in the credit management business.

classifications.title: credit rating information
classifications.description: Refers to the management information of credit rating agencies in the credit management business.

classifications.title: Credit investigation and rights protection information
classifications.description: Refers to information on complaints and lawsuits against credit reporting agencies in credit reporting management business.

classifications.title: Credit system construction management information
classifications.description: Refers to the credit system construction and management information in the credit management business.

classifications.title: Financial credit database management information
classifications.description: Refers to the basic database management information of financial credit information in the credit management business.

classifications.title: Personal credit inquiry information
classifications.description: This article is added manually with reference to Ji Zhiâ€™s preliminary sorting situation.

classifications.title: Non-bank payment structure off-site supervision business information
Announcement prompt information
classifications.description: Refers to the announcement prompt information in the off-site supervision business of non-bank payment institutions.

classifications.title: Reserve fund indicator review information
classifications.description: Refers to the review information of reserve fund indicators in the off-site supervision business of non-bank payment institutions.

classifications.title: Risk reserve indicator review information
classifications.description: Refers to the review information of risk reserve indicators in the off-site supervision business of non-bank payment institutions.

classifications.title: Review information on cost-benefit indicators of non-bank payment institutions
classifications.description: Refers to the review information of cost-benefit indicators of non-bank payment institutions in their off-site supervision business.

classifications.title: Non-bank payment institution business indicator review information
classifications.description: Refers to the review information of business indicators of non-bank payment institutions in their off-site supervision business.

classifications.title: Review information on asset and liability indicators of non-bank payment institutions
classifications.description: Refers to the review information of asset and liability indicators of non-bank payment institutions in the off-site supervision business of non-bank payment institutions.

classifications.title: Off-balance sheet business information
classifications.description: Refers to off-balance sheet business information in payment and settlement business.

classifications.title: Cash and issued fund information
classifications.description: Refers to cash and fund issuance business information in payment and settlement business.

classifications.title: Refinance information
classifications.description: Refers to the re-lending business information in the settlement business.

classifications.title: rediscount information
classifications.description: Refers to rediscount business information in payment and settlement business.

classifications.title: Account adjustment information
classifications.description: Refers to information on adjusting payment and settlement business accounts.

classifications.title: Important blank voucher management information
classifications.description: Refers to the management information of important blank vouchers such as checks.

classifications.title: Fiscal deposit information
classifications.description: Refers to the financial deposit payment information in payment and settlement business.

classifications.title: Public market business information
classifications.description: Refers to open market business information in payment and settlement business.

classifications.title: Account opening and closing information
classifications.description: Refers to information on the opening and cancellation of accounts at the People's Bank of China by financial institutions in the payment and settlement business.

classifications.title: General transfer information
classifications.description: Refers to the transfer business information of financial institutions in payment and settlement business.

classifications.title: RMB deposit reserve deposit information
classifications.description: Refers to the business information of RMB deposit reserves deposited by financial institutions in payment and settlement business.

classifications.title: Special deposit information
classifications.description: Refers to special deposit business information in payment and settlement business.

classifications.title: City business information
classifications.description: Refers to intra-city business information in payment and settlement business.

classifications.title: Foreign exchange accounting information
classifications.description: Refers to foreign exchange accounting business information in payment and settlement business.

classifications.title: LEI registration information
classifications.description: Refers to the business information generated by the identification code of a registered legal person.

classifications.title: LEI data release information
classifications.description: Refers to the business information released to the outside world by the identification code of the legal entity.

classifications.title: Basic transaction information
classifications.description: Refers to basic transaction data, such as transaction serial number, transaction date, transaction type (including financial transactions, such as deposits, remittances, etc., and non-financial transactions, such as account inquiries, password changes, etc.), transaction channels, transaction sources, transaction locations

classifications.title: Transaction amount information
classifications.description: Refers to information describing the amount actually incurred in the transaction, such as transaction currency, transaction amount, etc.

classifications.title: Counterparty information
classifications.description: Refers to relevant data of transaction objects in trading activities, such as counterparty type, counterparty customer name, counterparty's account opening bank and account number, etc.

classifications.title: Transaction clearing and settlement information
classifications.description: Refers to the data used by financial institutions to handle currency payments, fund transfers and fund settlement services for customers, such as originating banks, receiving banks, payment instructions, clearing details (merchant fees, channel costs, agent profit sharing, etc.), etc.

classifications.title: Transaction accounting information
classifications.description: Refers to the accounting entityâ€™s subsequent accounting and accounting data due to the economic activities that occurred in the transaction, such as the accounting date

classifications.title: Insurance charge information
classifications.description: Refers to various fee data such as insurance premiums that customers need to pay due to underwriting or preservation modifications, such as payment items, payment accounts, amounts, payment channels, payment dates, etc.

classifications.title: Insurance compensation and benefit information
classifications.description: Refers to the compensation or benefits and other expense data received by the customer due to preservation approval or claim settlement, such as benefit items, amounts, payment dates, insurance recipients, etc.

classifications.title: New product (project) research and development information
classifications.description: Refers to the data generated by a series of decision-making processes by financial institutions to select products that meet market needs, from product design to normal production, such as survey and research reports, ideas or creativity for developing new products, new product or variety design information, new

classifications.title: Basic Information
classifications.description: Refers to the basic description data used for product management, such as product number, product name, applicable customer type, etc.

classifications.title: Classified information
classifications.description: Refers to the relevant data used by financial institutions to classify the products of financial institutions based on the management needs of each department and business line, based on product classification standards, and using a specific product classification business perspective, such as product classification codes, product classification names, and product classification levels.

classifications.title: Feature information
classifications.description: Refers to the collection of financial product characteristics, such as term characteristics, insurance protection characteristics, amount and payment method characteristics, interest rate characteristics, insurance terms, etc.

classifications.title: management information
classifications.description: Refers to the data required for daily management of products, such as relevant documents for financial industry institutions to report (approval) their own products to regulatory agencies, as well as financial asset management companiesâ€™ proposed acquisition of non-performing assets and their review and approval information, post-investment management information, etc.

classifications.title: interest rate information
classifications.description: This article is added manually with reference to Ji Zhiâ€™s preliminary sorting situation.

classifications.title: Vehicle Information
classifications.description: This article is added manually with reference to Ji Zhiâ€™s preliminary sorting situation.

classifications.title: Offline own channel information (public)
classifications.description: Refers to store, outlet, counter, self-service equipment, insurance direct sales and other channel data, such as store name, counter name, location, contact information, etc.

classifications.title: Online own channel information (public)
classifications.description: Refers to data from online banking, mobile banking, insurance online malls and other channels that contact customers through web pages, APPs, WeChat official accounts, WeChat mini programs, etc., such as website addresses, installation software package download links or QR codes, service items, etc.

classifications.title: Third-party agent channel information (public)
classifications.description: Refers to public third-party agency channel data, such as information about business agents and promotion agencies, such as names, contact information, etc.

classifications.title: Channel management information
classifications.description: Refers to data related to the daily management and maintenance of channels such as channel number, channel activation date, channel deactivation date, agency contract information, agent certificate information, etc.

classifications.title: Channel contact information
classifications.description: This article is added manually with reference to Ji Zhiâ€™s preliminary sorting situation.

classifications.title: Channel guarantee information
classifications.description: This article is added manually with reference to Ji Zhiâ€™s preliminary sorting situation.

classifications.title: Channel affiliation information
classifications.description: This article is added manually with reference to Ji Zhiâ€™s preliminary sorting situation.

classifications.title: Marketing information (public)
classifications.description: Refers to data related to marketing activities, such as marketing promotional information, etc.

classifications.title: Marketing information (non-public)
classifications.description: Refers to data related to marketing activities, such as market analysis, target markets, marketing plans, etc.

classifications.title: Marketing management information
classifications.description: Refers to all process and result data of each link involved in customer marketing, such as marketing activities, rule models, marketing lists, task events (assessment indicators), marketing contacts, marketing results, marketing evaluations, assessment profit sharing information, etc.

classifications.title: Service management information
classifications.description: Refers to the relevant data generated in the management attribution set up for customers and the supporting service activities provided to service customers, such as account management relationships, service complaints and suggestions, customer points, and service information such as notifications and discounts (account management information, points management, complaints, etc.)

classifications.title: Technical security information
classifications.description: Refers to the technical design documents, plans, program codes and other data that protect the data carriers necessary for the operation of financial institutions, such as operating system centralized certification (authorization, audit) design documents, bank card key and protective measures design documents, bank card track encryption keys

classifications.title: Physical security information
classifications.description: Refers to the design documents, plans and other data for protecting the physical facilities of financial institutions, such as vault security plans, armored vehicle routes, monitoring and alarm system design plans, business outlets (including ATMs, self-service banks) security design documents, etc.

classifications.title: Parameter/indicator operation and maintenance information
classifications.description: Refers to the data generated during the operation and maintenance of business-related parameters or indicator data by the information system, such as operating parameters or indicators such as exchange rates, rates, preferential activities, card information (such as debit cards, credit cards, etc.) for products and services

classifications.title: Counter service information
classifications.description: Refers to the counter service interaction parties and service process data, such as service content, service personnel information, service evaluation, etc.

classifications.title: Telephone service information
classifications.description: Refers to the telephone service interaction parties and service process data, such as customer service content, telephone recordings, service personnel information, service records, service evaluations, etc.

classifications.title: Network service information
classifications.description: Refers to network service parties and service process data, such as device type (PC/mobile device), client type (browser/APP), IP address, service content, communication text or multimedia records, service personnel information, service evaluation, etc.

classifications.title: Document design information
classifications.description: Refers to the data generated during the document design process, such as electronic document template files, document definition documents and other data.

classifications.title: Document storage information
classifications.description: Refers to the data generated during the document warehousing process, such as acceptance results, warehousing certification documents, etc.

classifications.title: Document issuance information
classifications.description: Refers to the data generated during the document issuance process, such as application information, review information, issuance information, verification information and handover information, etc.

classifications.title: Document verification information
classifications.description: Refers to the data generated during the document verification process.

classifications.title: Document daily management information
classifications.description: Refers to the data recorded in all aspects of daily document management, such as document inventory information, handover information, usage tracking information, settlement information, etc.

classifications.title: Basic information of cooperative units
classifications.description: Refers to the basic information data of the cooperative unit, such as unit name, unit type, etc.

classifications.title: Partner contact information
classifications.description: Refers to the basic information of the contact person of the cooperative unit, such as name, phone number, email address, etc.

classifications.title: Cooperation content information
classifications.description: Refers to the cooperation content determined with the cooperative unit, such as contract agreement documents, evaluation and assessment results, etc.

classifications.title: Specific information of cooperative units
classifications.description: Refers to unique information data that is related to specific financial businesses and is not part of the basic information of the cooperative unit, such as repair equipment and technical personnel levels of automobile repair shops related to insurance business, business scope of adjustment companies, adjustment license information, etc.

classifications.title: Customer and regulatory related audio and video information
classifications.description: Refers to the audio and video data collected by financial industry machines when customers open accounts or handle various business activities and processed (such as compression, segmented transmission), or the image data converted from regulatory data, such as scanned documents

classifications.title: Daily management of related audio and video information
classifications.description: Refers to the audio and video data generated in the daily management process of financial industry institutions, such as videos, audio recordings, photos, and accounting files collected during meetings, security, team building activities, party building activities, etc.

classifications.title: Quantitative indicators of risk appetite
classifications.description: Refers to the target value or target interval data of financial industry institutions' profits, risks, capital, liquidity and other related indicators.

classifications.title: Risk appetite variable indicator
classifications.description: It refers to data such as qualitative description documents of financial industry institutions' risk preferences that cannot be quantified, and also includes information on the reasons for taking such risks and information on the management measures taken.

classifications.title: Risk resistance level information
classifications.description: Refers to relevant data that can reflect the level of capital and liquidity of financial institutions against various risks.

classifications.title: risk appetite deviation information
classifications.description: Refers to relevant documents and other data that reflect situations and disposal methods that may lead to deviations from risk appetite targets.

classifications.title: Risk Mitigation Information
classifications.description: Refers to relevant data such as mortgage information, guarantee information, financial derivatives information, etc. that financial institutions adopt risk mitigation tools such as mortgages, guarantees, and financial derivatives, or risk transfer technologies implemented through insurance, financing, and other means.

classifications.title: risk identification information
classifications.description: It refers to the statistical methods and tools, analysis models and related data generated in the process of understanding the various risks faced and analyzing the potential causes of risk accidents.

classifications.title: Risk measurement information
classifications.description: It refers to the full analysis and evaluation of the possibility of risk occurrence, consequences and severity of the risk on the basis of risk identification, so as to determine the relevant data of the risk level process, including models and statistical indicators, such as customer orders.

classifications.title: Risk monitoring information
classifications.description: Refers to data related to dynamic and continuous monitoring of changes and development trends of various quantifiable key risk indicators and unquantifiable risk factors, including credit card warning information, PD warning information, abnormal event information, credit risk customer monitoring information, monitoring reports, etc.

classifications.title: Risk control information
classifications.description: It refers to relevant data that is effectively managed and controlled by taking measures such as diversification, hedging, transfer, avoidance and compensation for identified and measured risks, including quota freezing information, account freezing information, limit information, etc.

classifications.title: blacklist information
classifications.description: Refers to customer information data with actual or potential risks, such as external purchases and internally generated blacklist information.

classifications.title: Anti-fraud information
classifications.description: This article is added manually with reference to Ji Zhiâ€™s preliminary sorting situation.

classifications.title: planning information
classifications.description: Refers to data such as planning documents of information projects and information systems.

classifications.title: Quality management information
classifications.description: Refers to information technology management documents, system documents, quality control documents and other data.

classifications.title: development information
classifications.description: Refers to information system design plans, source code and other data.

classifications.title: Test information
classifications.description: Refers to data such as test plans, test plans, and test reports.

classifications.title: Configuration information
classifications.description: Refers to data related to information system configuration, including key configuration parameters, storage paths, important parameters, etc.

classifications.title: Temporary tables
classifications.description: This article is added manually with reference to Ji Zhiâ€™s preliminary sorting situation.

classifications.title: history table
classifications.description: This article is added manually with reference to Ji Zhiâ€™s preliminary sorting situation.

classifications.title: Office software resources
classifications.description: Refers to the basic software and software product descriptions required for the office environment, such as database installation packages, upgrade packages, hardware product management information and related documentation.

classifications.title: Information asset management information
classifications.description: Refers to data related to information assets, including asset type information, asset value information, asset depreciation information, asset life cycle information, topological relationship information, system network security level list, etc.

classifications.title: Data dictionary information
classifications.description: Refers to the data dictionary in each information system, such as data symbols, data representations, explanations, etc.

classifications.title: Security management information
classifications.description: Refers to information system vulnerability information, security protection configuration and policy information, self-identified threat data, security alarm information, security incident information and other data.

classifications.title: Run log information
classifications.description: Refers to the log data recorded in various systems, applications, networks, computer room facilities, and monitoring platforms, such as recording time, recording date, recording content, alarm type, alarm level, diagnostic information, etc.

classifications.title: System operation and maintenance information
classifications.description: Refers to shell scripts, SQL scripts, etc. used for system maintenance or statistical data generation.

classifications.title: Empty table
classifications.description: This article is added manually with reference to Ji Zhiâ€™s preliminary sorting situation.

classifications.title: backup table
classifications.description: This article is added manually with reference to Ji Zhiâ€™s preliminary sorting situation.

classifications.title: Marketing planning information
classifications.description: Refers to data such as marketing activities of financial institutions and related business management documents.

classifications.title: Fund planning information
classifications.description: Refers to documents and other data related to the overall fund management activities of financial institutions.

classifications.title: Manpower demand planning information
classifications.description: Refers to documents and other data related to human resource management activities of financial industry institutions.

classifications.title: Brand strategic planning information
classifications.description: Refers to documents and other data related to brand management activities of financial industry institutions.

classifications.title: Business development planning information
classifications.description: Refers to the data recorded by financial institutions in the process of future business development planning, such as major choices and strategies for business development direction, development speed and quality, development points and business development capabilities within a certain period of time.

classifications.title: Personnel recruitment registration information
classifications.description: Refers to the information generated by financial industry institutions when they publish recruitment positions and applicant registrations, such as recruitment positions, number of recruits, registration lists, etc.

classifications.title: Personnel Recruitment Examination Information
classifications.description: Refers to the information generated by candidates participating in examinations related to recruitment positions in financial industry institutions, such as recruitment examination room numbers, examination center names, etc.

classifications.title: General employee information (public)
classifications.description: Refers to employee information data recorded by financial institutions that is open to customers, such as employee numbers, employee names, office phone numbers, etc.

classifications.title: Employee information (non-public)
classifications.description: Refers to employee information data recorded by financial institutions that should not be widely disclosed to others (people outside a certain range), such as mobile phone information, ID card information, email information, position, rank, social security, personal tax information, social relations, rewards and punishments

classifications.title: File management information
classifications.description: Refers to employee file information data recorded by financial industry institutions, such as personnel files, resumes, autobiographies, appraisals (evaluations), political history, etc.

classifications.title: Job role information
classifications.description: Refers to employee job positions, positions and other data recorded by financial industry institutions, such as job title, employee title, employee job title, employee team name, role information (such as political affiliation, confidential positions, members of specific working groups, etc.), etc.

classifications.title: Training and qualification information
classifications.description: Refers to the employee training record data and qualification certificate data recorded by financial industry institutions, such as the time of training, training location, training content, etc. and the time of obtaining the qualification certificate, the name of the qualification certificate, the validity period of the qualification certificate, etc.

classifications.title: Skill information
classifications.description: Refers to the skills and expertise data of employees recorded by financial industry institutions, such as sales skills, service communication skills, insurance underwriting, loss assessment skills, etc.

classifications.title: performance information
classifications.description: Refers to employee performance appraisal indicators and performance completion data recorded by financial industry institutions, such as sales performance data of sales employees (such as achievement of sales targets, products sold, etc.), service performance data of service employees (such as complaint resolution)

classifications.title: Salary information
classifications.description: Refers to employee salary and benefits data recorded by financial industry institutions, such as wages, allowances, bonuses, benefits, salary standards and salary grades, etc.

classifications.title: Basic information (public)
classifications.description: Refers to the public basic profile record data of the internal departments, branches, etc. in the organizational structure of financial industry institutions, such as institution number, institution name, institution address, institution telephone number, etc.

classifications.title: Basic information (non-public)
classifications.description: Refers to the basic overview record data of the internal departments, branches, etc. in the organizational structure of financial institutions that are not directly disclosed, such as department numbers, department names, department responsibilities, superior accounting agency numbers, etc.

classifications.title: Hierarchy information
classifications.description: Refers to the hierarchical identification data of internal departments, branches, etc. in the organizational structure of financial institutions, such as head office, branches, subsidiaries, etc.

classifications.title: Classified information
classifications.description: Refers to the identification data in the organizational structure of a financial industry institution, where its internal departments, branches, etc. are classified according to different management requirements, such as whether it is a business institution, whether it is an accounting institution, etc.

classifications.title: identity informaiton
classifications.description: Refers to the certificate information of various internal departments and branches of financial institutions, such as the unified social credit code (after the five certificates are merged into one), financial institution code certificate number, payment business license number, etc.

classifications.title: financial accounting information
classifications.description: Refers to relevant data generated during the accounting recognition, measurement and reporting process conducted by financial institutions in accordance with accounting standards, including accounting records, account books, statements, etc.

classifications.title: Enterprise financial management information
classifications.description: Refers to financial management information such as budget execution, working capital allocation, and year-end consolidation of enterprises and institutions.

classifications.title: Infrastructure financial management information
classifications.description: Refers to information such as capital construction project management and project accounting.

classifications.title: management accounting information
classifications.description: It refers to various types of data that financial institutions use management accounting tools and methods to process and organize financial and business data to meet the needs of enterprise value management and decision support.

classifications.title: financial expense information
classifications.description: Refers to various types of data generated by financial institutions during their financial expenditures and bidding and procurement processes, including supplier management data.

classifications.title: tax information
classifications.description: Refers to various types of data generated in the process of tax formation, declaration, payment and invoice management of financial industry institutions.

classifications.title: Internal fund transaction information
classifications.description: Refers to information on internal fund transfers and borrowings within financial institutions (groups).

classifications.title: Payment settlement summary information
classifications.description: Refers to various payment clearing and settlement data aggregated by financial industry institutions, such as merchant settlement data (such as settlement cycle, settlement method, etc.), settlement order data (such as summary net amount, settlement cycle, etc.), etc.

classifications.title: Summary information on capital channel circulation
classifications.description: Refers to data related to capital channel circulation summarized by financial industry institutions, such as total channel capital flow, channel reconciliation details, channel reconciliation results, etc.

classifications.title: Treasury management information
classifications.description: It refers to the relevant data stored by financial industry institutions to perform a series of management functions of government control budget execution and custody of government assets and liabilities.

classifications.title: Interest rate management information
classifications.description: It refers to the data recorded by financial industry institutions on the adjustment of interest rates by the central bank and the data recorded during the implementation of interest rate policies.

classifications.title: Asset Liability Management Information
classifications.description: It refers to the data recorded in the process of comprehensive, dynamic and forward-looking coordinated management of the asset and liability structure by financial institutions within certain risk limits in order to achieve business objectives.

classifications.title: Party affairs discipline inspection information
classifications.description: Refers to the data recorded when financial industry institutions carry out party building, disciplinary inspection and other work, such as party organizational construction, party style and clean government construction, disciplinary supervision, investigation and handling of disciplinary violations, acceptance of letters and visits from party members and the public, etc.

classifications.title: Union information
classifications.description: Refers to the data recorded when financial industry institutions carry out trade union work, such as member information, dues management data, various activity records, etc.

classifications.title: Charter information
classifications.description: Refers to the electronic document data of the regulatory, guiding and binding articles of association formulated by financial institutions in accordance with laws, decrees and policies to maintain normal working order, such as company articles of association, company financial management system, company asset management system,

classifications.title: Disclosure information
classifications.description: Refers to various types of public information data released by financial industry institutions, such as news, notices, announcements, etc.

classifications.title: Official document information
classifications.description: Refers to the electronic document data that is received or sent in the daily work of financial institutions and is formed and used in a specific manner and through certain processing procedures, such as urgency, issuing authority logo, issuing number, issuer, title, main sending authority, and text.

classifications.title: Email message
classifications.description: Refers to various file information data processed by employees of financial institutions through email delivery, such as email sending time, email receiving time, email subject, email content, email attachments and pictures, etc.

classifications.title: Compliance information
classifications.description: Refers to the compliance result data generated by financial industry institutions with reference to the express provisions and requirements of national laws and regulations, such as information isolation, data confidentiality, etc.

classifications.title: internal audit information
classifications.description: Refers to the audit evaluation result data generated by financial institutions in the process of business development or business management to determine whether they meet regulatory, compliance and internal control requirements, such as medium and long-term audit plans, annual audit plans, audit plans, audit evidence,

classifications.title: Legal information
classifications.description: Refers to data involving legal affairs of financial industry institutions, such as contract signing, business negotiations, legal disputes and litigation incident handling, etc.

classifications.title: Regulatory indicator reporting information
classifications.description: Refers to the regulatory indicator data reported by financial institutions as required, such as the total amount of risk assets, the amount and structure of net capital, core capital adequacy ratio, capital adequacy ratio, statistical indicators of the traditional non-performing asset acquisition and disposal business of financial asset management companies (legal persons),

classifications.title: Supervision detailed data reporting information
classifications.description: Refers to various types of detailed regulatory data reported by financial institutions as required, such as anti-money laundering data (including but not limited to large-value and suspicious transaction reports, investigation assistance, customer risk levels and other information), regulatory standardized data, list-level business data, accounts

classifications.title: financial statistics
classifications.description: Refers to macro statistics related data calculated by financial industry institutions, such as financial statements, questionnaires and other important matters.

classifications.title: Evaluation, Penalty and Violation Information
classifications.description: Refers to the evaluation, punishment and violation data of financial industry institutions by regulatory agencies, such as fines and notifications issued by regulatory agencies.

classifications.title: Statistical analysis information
classifications.description: It refers to the data formed by the regulatory agenciesâ€™ summary, statistics, analysis, comparison and combination of relevant data, such as the sub-scores of the evaluation indicators of systemically important financial industry institutions, etc.

classifications.title: Warning information
classifications.description: Refers to the early warning data generated by regulatory agencies based on specific early warning strategy settings, such as risk warnings issued by regulatory agencies, etc.
